TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHttpAsyncHandler implements class System.Web.IHttpHandler

summary.span: Defines the contract that HTTP asynchronous handler objects must implement.

span.span: Defines the contract that HTTP asynchronous handler objects must implement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可以關聯檔案的副檔名或特定 URL 的組態檔中`httpHandlers`組態區段。An class can be associated with a file name extension or a particular URL by a configuration file, in the `httpHandlers` configuration section. ASP.NET 基礎結構接著具現化，並收到對應的要求時呼叫的處理常式。The ASP.NET infrastructure will then instantiate and call the handler when the corresponding request is received. 或者，.ashx 檔案和.ashx 檔案處理常式將會執行收到對應的要求時，可以定義處理常式。Alternatively, the handler can be defined in an .ashx file and when the corresponding request is received for the .ashx file the hander will be executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用發出非同步程序期間攔截到任何例外狀況。You can use to raise any exceptions caught during the asynchronous process.
